comments:
Build ID: I20070517-1700

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Install Tonga drop 14
2.Create a Syabase Data Federation conection profile
3.Change the host = sairhartxp.sybase.com
4.Accept all the other defaults
5.Press the "Test Connection" button
6.If unable to ping the server call me at 3.413.4056 and I will start it.
7."Generate DDL.." on the "Catalogs" node (this generates an java.util.NoSuchElementException)
8.Expand the Catalogs node and "Generate DDL.." on the first child node (this generates a java.lang.ClassCastException)


More information:

Brian, this involves vendor specific code path that's not in DTP. Please do not us bugzilla to track vendor specific issues.
Turns out that this involves vendor specific code path that's not in DTP.
